articles.description: Legend Zafar Iqbal urged for the inclusion of Pakistan players in Hockey India League and also asked for the revival of India vs Pakistan series. | Hockey
articles.content: Indian hockey legend Zafar Iqbal on Thursday pitched for Pakistan players to be allowed to compete in the Hockey India League (HIL), which is being revived after a gap of seven years. HIL is set to r… [+2771 chars]

articles.title: Djokovic: “That match defined my path” - Tennis Majors
articles.description: Novak Djokovic has spoken to Serbian media about a painful defeat that shaped the path of his future career…
articles.content:
The year is 2010, at the quarter-finals of Roland Garros. Novak Djokovic was two sets and a break up in his duel with Jürgen Melzer. He lost.
